  • Register Hi {{loggedInUserName}}!
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from "../authentication/authentication.service" @Component({ selector: 'app-nav-menu', templateUrl: './nav-menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav-menu.component.css'] }) export class NavMenuComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private _authService: AuthService) { } isExpanded = false; collapse() { this.isExpanded = false; } toggle() { this.isExpanded = !this.isExpanded; } get loggedIn() { return this._authService.isLoggedIn; } get loggedInUserName() { return this._authService.loggedInUser; } ngOnInit() { console.log("hh", this._authService.loggedInUser); // Check the value of loggedInUserName } }
